scripts.deploy: aws deploy push --application-name osb_deploy_app --s3-location s3://osb-deploy-bucket/pando_v1.zip --ignore-hidden-files && aws deploy create-deployment --application-name osb_deploy_app --deployment-config-name CodeDeployDefault.OneAtATime --deployment-group-name DG1 --s3-location bucket=osb-deploy-bucket,bundleType=zip,key=pando_v1.zip
